title: Chiral ground-state currents of interacting photons in a synthetic magnetic field
title_cn: 合成磁场中相互作用光子的手性基态电流
abstract: The intriguing many-body phases of quantum matter arise from the interplay of particle interactions, spatial symmetries, and external fields. Generating these phases in an engineered system could provide deeper insight into their nature. Using superconducting qubits, we simultaneously realize synthetic magnetic fields and strong particle interactions, which are among the essential elements for studying quantum magnetism and fractional quantum Hall phenomena. The artificial magnetic fields are synthesized by sinusoidally modulating the qubit couplings. In a closed loop formed by the three qubits, we observe the directional circulation of photons, a signature of broken time-reversal symmetry. We demonstrate strong interactions through the creation of photon vacancies, or ‘holes’, which circulate in the opposite direction. The combination of these key elements results in chiral ground-state currents. Our work introduces an experimental platform for engineering quantum phases of strongly interacting photons.
abstract_cn: 引人入胜的量子态多体相源于粒子相互作用，空间对称性和外场的相互作用。在工程系统中生成这些阶段可以提供对其性质的更深入的了解。使用超导量子位，我们可以同时实现合成磁场和强粒子相互作用，这是研究量子磁性和分数量子霍尔现象的基本要素。人造磁场是通过正弦调制量子位耦合来合成的。在由三个量子位形成的闭环中，我们观察到了光子的定向循环，这是破碎的时间反转对称性的标志。我们通过创建以相反方向循环的光子空位或“孔”来演示强大的交互作用。这些关键元素的组合产生手性基态电流。我们的工作引入了一个实验平台，用于工程化强相互作用的光子的量子相。

title: A proton density bubble in the doubly magic 34Si nucleus
title_cn: 双重魔术34Si核中的质子密度气泡
abstract: Many properties of the atomic nucleus, such as vibrations, rotations and incompressibility, can be interpreted as due to a two-component quantum liquid of protons and neutrons. Electron scattering measurements on stable nuclei demonstrate that their central densities are saturated, as for liquid drops. In exotic nuclei near the limits of mass and charge, with large imbalances in their proton and neutron numbers, the possibility of a depleted central density, or a ‘bubble’ structure, has been discussed in a recurrent manner since the 1970s. Here we report first experimental evidence that points to a depletion of the central density of protons in the short-lived nucleus 34Si. The proton-to-neutron density asymmetry in 34Si offers the possibility to place constraints on the density and isospin dependence of the spin–orbit force—on which nuclear models have disagreed for decades—and on its stabilizing effect towards limits of nuclear existence.
abstract_cn: 原子核的许多性质，例如振动，旋转和不可压缩性，可以解释为是由于质子和中子的两组分量子液体所致。在稳定原子核上的电子散射测量表明，与液滴一样，它们的中心密度已饱和。在质子和电荷的极限附近的外来原子核中，质子和中子数失衡很大，有可能出现中心密度耗尽或“气泡”的现象。自1970年代以来，已经反复讨论了这种结构。在这里，我们报告了第一个实验证据，指出短寿命原子核<sup> 34 </ sup> Si中质子的中心密度耗竭。 <sup> 34 </ sup> Si中质子对中子的密度不对称提供了对自旋轨道力的密度和等旋旋依赖性施加约束的可能性，自旋轨道力在数十年来一直不认同该自旋轨道力。 8212；及其对限制核存在的稳定作用。</ p>

title: Spiral spin-liquid and the emergence of a vortex-like state in MnSc2S4
title_cn: 螺旋自旋液体和MnSc2S4中漩涡状状态的出现
abstract: Spirals and helices are common motifs of long-range order in magnetic solids, and they may also be organized into more complex emergent structures such as magnetic skyrmions and vortices. A new type of spiral state, the spiral spin-liquid, in which spins fluctuate collectively as spirals, has recently been predicted to exist. Here, using neutron scattering techniques, we experimentally prove the existence of a spiral spin-liquid in MnSc2S4 by directly observing the ‘spiral surface’—a continuous surface of spiral propagation vectors in reciprocal space. We elucidate the multi-step ordering behaviour of the spiral spin-liquid, and discover a vortex-like triple-q phase on application of a magnetic field. Our results prove the effectiveness of the J1–J2 Hamiltonian on the diamond lattice as a model for the spiral spin-liquid state in MnSc2S4, and also demonstrate a new way to realize a magnetic vortex lattice through frustrated interactions.
abstract_cn: 螺旋形和螺旋形是磁性固体中远距离有序的常见图案，它们也可能组织成更复杂的涌现结构，例如磁性天体和涡旋。最近已经预测到存在一种新型的螺旋状态，即螺旋自旋液体，其中自旋共同地以螺旋形式波动。在这里，使用中子散射技术，我们通过直接观察“螺旋表面”来证明MnSc <sub> 2 </ sub> S <sub> 4 </ sub>中存在螺旋自旋液体。在互易空间中螺旋传播矢量的连续表面。我们阐明了螺旋自旋液体的多步有序行为，并在施加磁场的情况下发现了涡旋状的三重q相。我们的结果证明了金刚石晶格上J <sub> 1 </ sub>＆＃8211; J <sub> 2 </ sub>哈密顿量作为MnSc <sub> 2中螺旋自旋液体状态模型的有效性</ sub> S <sub> 4 </ sub>，并演示了一种通过沮丧的相互作用实现磁涡旋晶格的新方法。</ p>

title: Direct observation of the skyrmion Hall effect
title_cn: 直接观察天蝎子厅效应
abstract: The well-known Hall effect describes the transverse deflection of charged particles (electrons/holes) as a result of the Lorentz force. Similarly, it is intriguing to examine if quasi-particles without an electric charge, but with a topological charge, show related transverse motion. Magnetic skyrmions with a well-defined spin texture with a unit topological charge serve as good candidates to test this hypothesis. In spite of the recent progress made on investigating magnetic skyrmions, direct observation of the skyrmion Hall effect has remained elusive. Here, by using a current-induced spin Hall spin torque, we experimentally demonstrate the skyrmion Hall effect, and the resultant skyrmion accumulation, by driving skyrmions from the creep-motion regime (where their dynamics are influenced by pinning defects) into the steady-flow-motion regime. The experimental observation of transverse transport of skyrmions due to topological charge may potentially create many exciting opportunities, such as topological selection.
abstract_cn: 众所周知的霍尔效应描述了由于洛伦兹力导致的带电粒子（电子/空穴）的横向偏转。同样，检查没有电荷但带有拓扑电荷的准粒子是否显示相关的横向运动也很有趣。具有明确自旋纹理并带有单位拓扑电荷的磁性天rm是测试该假设的良好候选者。尽管在研究磁性天rm离子方面取得了最新进展，但是直接观察天ion离子霍尔效应仍然难以捉摸。在这里，通过使用电流感应的自旋霍尔自旋转矩，我们通过驱动从蠕变运动状态（其动力学受到钉扎缺陷影响的状态）到稳定状态的斯堪的纳维亚离子，通过实验证明了斯堪的离子霍尔效应以及由此产生的斯堪的离子累积。流动运动机制。对由于拓扑电荷而产生的天体离子进行横向运输的实验观察可能会带来许多令人兴奋的机会，例如拓扑选择。

title: Skyrmion Hall effect revealed by direct time-resolved X-ray microscopy
title_cn: 通过直接时间分辨X射线显微镜显示Skyrmion霍尔效应
abstract: Magnetic skyrmions are promising candidates for future spintronic applications such as skyrmion racetrack memories and logic devices. They exhibit exotic and complex dynamics governed by topology and are less influenced by defects, such as edge roughness, than conventionally used domain walls. In particular, their non-zero topological charge leads to a predicted ‘skyrmion Hall effect’, in which current-driven skyrmions acquire a transverse velocity component analogous to charged particles in the conventional Hall effect. Here, we use nanoscale pump–probe imaging to reveal the real-time dynamics of skyrmions driven by current-induced spin–orbit torques. We find that skyrmions move at a well-defined angle ΘSkH that can exceed 30° with respect to the current flow, but in contrast to conventional theoretical expectations, ΘSkH increases linearly with velocity up to at least 100 ms−1. We qualitatively explain our observation based on internal mode excitations in combination with a field-like spin–orbit torque, showing that one must go beyond the usual rigid skyrmion description to understand the dynamics.
abstract_cn: 磁性天sky是未来自旋电子应用的有前途的候选者，例如天sky赛道存储器和逻辑设备。与常规使用的畴壁相比，它们表现出受拓扑控制的奇异和复杂的动力学，并且受缺陷（例如边缘粗糙度）的影响较小。特别是，它们的非零拓扑电荷会导致预测的“ Skyrmion霍尔效应”，其中电流驱动的Skyrmion获得类似于常规Hall效应中带电粒子的横向速度分量。在这里，我们使用纳米级的泵探针成像技术来揭示由电流感应的自旋轨道转矩驱动的天体的实时动态。我们发现天蝎子以明确定义的角度＆＃920; SkH 移动，该角度可以超过30＆＃176;相对于电流，但与传统的理论预期相反，＆＃920; SkH 随速度至少达到100＆＃8201; ms ＆＃8722; 1而线性增加sup>。我们基于内模激励结合类似场的自旋轨道扭矩定性地解释了我们的观察结果，表明人们必须超越通常的刚性天文描述才能理解动力学。

title: Strongly exchange-coupled triplet pairs in an organic semiconductor
title_cn: 有机半导体中的强交换耦合三重态对
abstract: From biological complexes to devices based on organic semiconductors, spin interactions play a key role in the function of molecular systems. For instance, triplet-pair reactions impact operation of organic light-emitting diodes as well as photovoltaic devices. Conventional models for triplet pairs assume they interact only weakly. Here, using electron spin resonance, we observe long-lived, strongly interacting triplet pairs in an organic semiconductor, generated via singlet fission. Using coherent spin manipulation of these two-triplet states, we identify exchange-coupled (spin-2) quintet complexes coexisting with weakly coupled (spin-1) triplets. We measure strongly coupled pairs with a lifetime approaching 3 μs and a spin coherence time approaching 1 μs, at 10 K. Our results pave the way for the utilization of high-spin systems in organic semiconductors.
abstract_cn: 从生物复合物到基于有机半导体的设备，自旋相互作用在分子系统的功能中起着关键作用。 例如，三重态对反应影响有机发光二极管以及光伏器件的运行。 三重态对的常规模型假定它们仅相互作用较弱。 在这里，利用电子自旋共振，我们观察到有机半导体中通过单线态裂变产生的长寿命，相互作用强的三重态对。 使用这两个三重态的相干自旋操纵，我们确定与弱耦合（spin-1）三重态共存的交换耦合（spin-2）五重态复合体。 我们以10 K的寿命测量接近3的强耦合对和接近1的自旋相干时间的自旋相干时间。 我们的结果为在有机半导体中利用高自旋系统铺平了道路。

title: Quintet multiexciton dynamics in singlet fission
title_cn: 单重态裂变中的五重态多激子动力学
abstract: Singlet fission, in which two triplet excitons are generated from a single absorbed photon, is a key third-generation solar cell concept. Conservation of angular momentum requires that singlet fission populates correlated multiexciton states, which can subsequently dissociate to generate free triplets. However, little is known about electronic and spin correlations in these systems since, due to its typically short lifetime, the multiexciton state is challenging to isolate and study. Here, we use bridged pentacene dimers, which undergo intramolecular singlet fission while isolated in solution and in solid matrices, as a unimolecular model system that can trap long-lived multiexciton states. We combine transient absorption and time-resolved electron spin resonance spectroscopies to show that spin correlations in the multiexciton state persist for hundreds of nanoseconds. Furthermore, we confirm long-standing predictions that singlet fission produces triplet pair states of quintet character. We compare two different pentacene–bridge–pentacene chromophores, systematically tuning the coupling between the pentacenes to understand how differences in molecular structure affect the population and dissociation of multiexciton quintet states.
abstract_cn: 单裂变是一个重要的第三代太阳能电池概念，其中单个吸收的光子会产生两个三重态激子。角动量的守恒要求单线态裂变填充相关的多激子态，其随后可解离以生成自由三重态。然而，对于这些系统中的电子和自旋相关性知之甚少，因为由于其典型的寿命短，多激子态难以分离和研究。在这里，我们使用桥接的并五苯二聚体作为可捕获长寿命多激子态的单分子模型系统，该分子在溶液和固体基质中分离时会经历分子内单峰裂变。我们结合瞬态吸收和时间分辨的电子自旋共振光谱，以表明在多激子状态下自旋相关性持续了数百纳秒。此外，我们证实了长期存在的预测，即单重态裂变会产生五重态的三重态。我们比较了两种不同的并五苯并五苯并发色团，系统地调节并五苯之间的偶联，以了解分子结构上的差异如何影响多激子五重态的数量和解离。

title: Electric-field-induced spin disorder-to-order transition near a multiferroic triple phase point
title_cn: 多铁性三相点附近的电场诱导的自旋无序到有序跃迁
abstract: The emergence of a triple phase point in a two-dimensional parameter space (such as pressure and temperature) can offer unforeseen opportunities for the coupling of two seemingly independent order parameters. On the basis of this, we demonstrate the electric control of magnetic order by manipulating chemical pressure: lanthanum substitution in the antiferromagnetic ferroelectric BiFeO3. Our demonstration relies on the finding that a multiferroic triple phase point of a single spin-disordered phase and two spin-ordered phases emerges near room temperature in Bi0.9La0.1FeO3 ferroelectric thin films. By using spatially resolved X-ray absorption spectroscopy, we provide direct evidence that the electric poling of a particular region of the compound near the triple phase point results in an antiferromagnetic phase while adjacent unpoled regions remain magnetically disordered, opening a promising avenue for magnetoelectric applications at room temperature.
abstract_cn: 在二维参数空间（例如压力和温度）中出现三相点可以为耦合两个看似独立的阶次参数提供不可预料的机会。在此基础上，我们通过控制化学压力来证明磁序的电控制：在反铁磁铁电体BiFeO 3 中的镧取代。我们的论证基于以下发现：在室温附近，Bi 0.9 La 0.1 FeO <>中出现了一个自旋无序相和两个自旋有序相的多铁性三相点。 sub> 3 铁电薄膜。通过使用空间分辨的X射线吸收光谱法，我们提供了直接的证据，即化合物的特定区域在三相点附近的电极化会产生反铁磁相，而相邻的未极化区域仍保持磁无序，从而为磁电应用打开了广阔的前景在室温下。
